what are the permissions on ~/.config/ ?: on I see your pastebin. looks like it's crashing. could be something to do with your theme. you could try manually changing the theme and trying to run obconf again.
edit rc.xml and look for the opening <theme> tag
for <theme> make it <!--theme> and for </theme> make it </theme-->, then restart openbox. if it doesnt start, edit that file and remove the !-- and -- to get it to start again.
not sure if this will let you open obconf, just a hunch
no it dodn't work, I now have a blue theme and it didn't open.
ok change it back, one sec
if you `sudo su` then run obconf, does that open?
if this isn't you, then check this out http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=839978
it probably is a theme issue according to that thread
if you can't tell which theme it is, backup all of them and only put your theme in there, then start it. if ti starts, add them one by one until you figure out which one is the culprit :D
or maybe just single out the compressed ones. bz2, gz, etc
